General.Name: Azucar Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Azucar Minerals Ltd. acquires, explores for, and develops mineral resource properties Canada, the United States, and Mexico. The company explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the El Cobre property that includes 9 mineral concessions covering a combined area of 11,864.4 hectares located in Veracruz, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Almadex Minerals Limited and changed its name to Azucar Minerals Ltd. in May 2018. Azucar Minerals Ltd. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1177 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2L3
